title: Venezuela 's budget balance in relation to GDP 2018
yAxis: Budget balance in relation to GDP
summary: In general Budget balance in relation to GDP has rose over the Year.
Budget balance in relation to GDP is slightly increasing from 2013 to 2014.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2013 and 2014.
The highest Budget balance in relation to GDP, of value 15.55 was reached at Year 2014
The lowest Budget balance in relation to GDP, of value 11.27 was reported at Year 2013
min_summary: Overall Budget balance in relation to GDP has increased over the Year.
Budget balance in relation to GDP is slightly increasing from 2013 to 2014.
